title: Devil's Pawn
description: IsabelleJericho St. James hates my family.Powerful, wealthy beyond belief, he is the most dangerous man I know.And I belong to him.He’s taken me from my home. He plans to make me his wife.And he’s made it very clear I’ll be sleeping in his bed. But my beast has a secret. His one weakness. One that makes hating him impossible.He has a daughter. And he’ll do anything to keep her safe.JerichoThe Bishops stole what money cannot replace.A life for a life. Now I’ll take one of theirs. Isabelle is the perfect pawn.I will make her my wife. I will bed her.She will be mine in every way.And once I take what I need from her, I will erase the Bishop family as if they never existed at all.
author: Natasha Knight
